plot: On each programme one celebrity guest will view and react to their obituary film. Each film is not just a portrait - it's an obituary, with all the trappings that entails.
plot_en: On each programme one celebrity guest will view and react to their obituary film. Each film is not just a portrait - it's an obituary, with all the trappings that entails.
plot_es: On each programme one celebrity guest will view and react to their obituary film. Each film is not just a portrait - it's an obituary, with all the trappings that entails.
title: Buried Alive
